title: Jim Gray | Ep 61 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Jim Gray | Ep 61 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Legendary sportscaster and reporter Jim Gray joins Matt and Stak on Episode 61 of All The Smoke. Gray opens up about his illustrious career where he has gotten to interview some of the biggest athletes and people in history, including Muhammad Ali, former presidents, Lebron James, and many more. Gray recalls interviewing Lebron for his 1-hour "The Decision" special when he announced he was leaving Cleveland for Miami. He also discusses his strong relationship with Kobe Bryant and remembers his interviews with the basketball icon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
